statements: SELECT * FROM coaching_staff_schedule;
SELECT full_name, certification FROM coaching_staff_schedule WHERE certification = 'Level 2';
SELECT staff_id, assignment FROM coaching_staff_schedule ORDER BY staff_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff_schedule WHERE assignment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name AS name, assignment AS duty FROM coaching_staff_schedule WHERE staff_id = 3;
SELECT full_name, certification FROM coaching_staff_schedule WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff_schedule ORDER BY certification DESC, full_name ASC;
SELECT staff_id, full_name, assignment FROM coaching_staff_schedule WHERE certification LIKE '%Certified%';
SELECT full_name, assignment FROM coaching_staff_schedule WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%' AND certification = 'Senior Coach';
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff_schedule WHERE assignment IS NOT NULL ORDER BY assignment ASC, staff_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff;
SELECT staff_name, department FROM coaching_staff WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT staff_name, department, assignment_description FROM coaching_staff AS cs INNER JOIN assignments AS a ON cs.staff_id = a.staff_id;
SELECT staff_name, department, start_date, end_date FROM coaching_staff AS cs INNER JOIN assignments AS a ON cs.staff_id = a.staff_id WHERE a.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT staff_name, certification_status FROM coaching_staff ORDER BY staff_name DESC, certification_status ASC;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff WHERE certification_status = TRUE ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT staff_name, department FROM coaching_staff WHERE department = 'Administration';
SELECT staff_name, start_date, end_date FROM coaching_staff JOIN assignments ON coaching_staff.staff_id = assignments.staff_id;
SELECT staff_name, assignment_description FROM coaching_staff JOIN assignments ON coaching_staff.staff_id = assignments.staff_id WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS staff_count FROM coaching_staff GROUP BY department ORDER BY staff_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff;
SELECT staff_name, position FROM coaching_staff;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, position FROM coaching_staff ORDER BY staff_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT staff_id, certification_name FROM certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Cert%' ORDER BY staff_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff ORDER BY staff_name DESC;
SELECT staff_name, position FROM coaching_staff WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT cs.staff_name, s.shift_start, s.shift_end FROM coaching_staff cs INNER JOIN schedules s ON cs.staff_id = s.staff_id;
SELECT cs.staff_name, c.certification_name FROM coaching_staff cs INNER JOIN certifications c ON cs.staff_id = c.staff_id WHERE c.certification_name LIKE '%Coach%';

SELECT cs.staff_name, COUNT(c.certification_id) AS num_certifications FROM coaching_staff cs LEFT JOIN certifications c ON cs.staff_id = c.staff_id GROUP BY cs.staff_name HAVING num_certifications >= 2;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM coaching_staff WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM coaching_staff ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff WHERE staff_role = 'Head Coach';
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM coaching_staff WHERE certification_status = true ORDER BY staff_name ASC;

SELECT cs.staff_name, s.day_of_week, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM coaching_staff cs INNER JOIN assignments a ON cs.staff_id = a.staff_id INNER JOIN schedules s ON a.schedule_id = s.schedule_id WHERE a.assignment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.day_of_week ASC, s.start_time ASC;

SELECT c.certification_name, COUNT(cs.staff_id) AS total_staff FROM certifications c LEFT JOIN coaching_staff cs ON c.certification_id = cs.staff_id GROUP BY c.certification_name ORDER BY total_staff DESC;
SELECT MAX(end_time) AS last_shift_end_time FROM schedules;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, staff_role FROM coaching_staff WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM schedule ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT staff_name, task_description, status FROM assignment WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT staff_name, certification_name, last_updated FROM certification INNER JOIN team_coordination ON certification.certification_id = team_coordination.coordination_id;
SELECT * FROM coaching_staff;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, staff_role FROM coaching_staff WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM coaching_staff WHERE staff_role = 'Head Coach';
SELECT * FROM assignment ORDER BY staff_id DESC;
SELECT staff_id, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM assignment GROUP BY staff_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
